channel.title: Life Runes
channel.description: I have searched for a good RSC private server (yet I haven't found one), and I think it would be awesome if someone had a server with life runes. Jagex was going to add these in right before they switched to RuneScape 2.

item.title: Life Runes
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

“Initially, we were considering Summoning as an addition to Magic. We actually made the life rune for Classic, but didn’t release it. Some players discovered its existence, but there was no way to actually get it,” says Paul. Developing the RS2 engine held up things for a while and, by the time we got back to Summoning, there’d been some changes. “At that point, Magic was already filling out and we were also concepting Desert Treasure and alternate spellbooks, so decided it would be better as a new skill rather than an addition to an older one,” says Mod Mark.

Read full topic

You enter any details in login to create your account. That’s off-topic though.

item.description:
@zol wrote:

xrscx:

they were going to use life runes for summoning but decided to hold summoning back untill rs2 and just seemed to never release it ever

No. They simply didn’t do summoning. They didn’t even have RS2 in their minds when they made this.

item.title: Life Runes
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

life rune was an item wayyy before you knew what it was
31: Fire-Rune
32: Water-Rune
33: Air-Rune
34: Earth-Rune
35: Mind-Rune
36: Body-Rune
37: Life-Rune
38: Death-Rune

ir was the 38th item ever made in runescape classic before the death rune they never implemeted its use kill yourself while you are ahead

Read full topic

item.title: Life Runes
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Life runes did exist as items in the real RSC client, and were not obtainable in the game. When examined it said “Used for summoning.” You could see them in your inventory by using a memory editor such as ArtMoney to change the item Id you saw in the client, however this would not effect your actual items.

Heres a picture of a life rune in RSC:

And yes, when they released RS2 the life rune was not an item.

Read full topic
